title: What is the Munich tennis schedule?
description: The BMW Open by Bitpanda begins Monday in Munich. Top seed and home favourite Alexander Zverev is among the players who will be in action on Day 1 of main-draw play at the ATP 500 event. View Monday's full order of play below (how to watch).  ORDER OF PLAY - MONDAY, 14 APRIL 2025 Center Court - start 11:00 Miomir Kecmanovic (SRB) vs Marcos Giron (USA) [Q] Borna Gojo (CRO) vs [2] Ben Shelton (USA) [1] Alexander Zverev (GER) vs Alexandre Muller (FRA) [Q] Chun-Hsin Tseng (TPE) vs [WC] Daniel Altmaier (GER) Court 1 - start 11:00 Tallon Griekspoor (NED) vs [Q] Learner Tien (USA) [LL] Billy Harris (GBR) vs David Goffin (BEL) Sadio Doumbia (FRA) / Fabien Reboul (FRA) vs Adam Pavlasek (CZE) / Jackson Withrow (USA) Court 2 - start 11:00 Andre Goransson (SWE) / Sem Verbeek (NED) vs Francisco Cerundolo (ARG) / Flavio Cobolli (ITA) Sander Gille (BEL) / Jan Zielinski (POL) vs [WC] Andreas Mies (GER) / Jan-Lennard Struff (GER) [NEWSLETTER FORM]

Munich

View the full Monday order of play for Munich

April 13, 2025

BMW Open by Bitpanda

The BMW Open by Bitpanda is now an ATP 500 event. By ATP Staff

The BMW Open by Bitpanda begins Monday in Munich. Top seed and home favourite Alexander Zverev is among the players who will be in action on Day 1 of main-draw play at the ATP 500 event.

View Monday's full order of play below (how to watch). 

You May Also Like: Scouting Report: Alcaraz, Zverev target home hat tricks in Barcelona & Munich

ORDER OF PLAY - MONDAY, 14 APRIL 2025

Center Court - start 11:00
Miomir Kecmanovic (SRB) vs Marcos Giron (USA)
[Q] Borna Gojo (CRO) vs [2] Ben Shelton (USA)
[1] Alexander Zverev (GER) vs Alexandre Muller (FRA)
[Q] Chun-Hsin Tseng (TPE) vs [WC] Daniel Altmaier (GER)

Court 1 - start 11:00
Tallon Griekspoor (NED) vs [Q] Learner Tien (USA)
[LL] Billy Harris (GBR) vs David Goffin (BEL)
Sadio Doumbia (FRA) / Fabien Reboul (FRA) vs Adam Pavlasek (CZE) / Jackson Withrow (USA)

Court 2 - start 11:00
Andre Goransson (SWE) / Sem Verbeek (NED) vs Francisco Cerundolo (ARG) / Flavio Cobolli (ITA)
Sander Gille (BEL) / Jan Zielinski (POL) vs [WC] Andreas Mies (GER) / Jan-Lennard Struff (GER)
